channel.title: Ban
channel.description: How do I make it so when you right click a player it says ban and when you click it, it bans them?

item.title: Ban
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“jads, post:2, topic:180673”]Add the option?
:eek:

else if(playerRights >= 2) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("@bla@B@red@a@bla@n"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }[/quote]

he wants to kno how to make the ban work, all that would do is make it say “ban”

-.-
